actor_awards.notes: A pre-Code staple at Warner Bros, known for her big eyes, wit, and playing brassy, gold-digging dames. She received an Academy Award nomination for The Blue Veil and was highly acclaimed for The Cincinnati Kid.

filmography.title: The Public Enemy
filmography.role_description: The girlfriend of a rising gangster's best friend, known for her street smarts and loyalty.
filmography.plot: A young hoodlum rises up the ranks of the Chicago underworld, even as a gangster's accidental death threatens to spark a mob war.

filmography.title: Night Nurse
filmography.role_description: A cynical and experienced nurse who partners with the protagonist to save two starving children.
filmography.plot: A private nurse uncovers a plot to starve two children to death to get their trust fund money.

filmography.title: Blonde Crazy
filmography.role_description: A hotel linen clerk who teams up with a bellhop to run various con games.
filmography.plot: A bellhop and a chambermaid team up to con hotel guests, but their scams eventually catch up with them.

filmography.title: Three on a Match
filmography.role_description: A reform school girl who becomes a showgirl and tries to help her troubled childhood friends.
filmography.plot: Three women renew their childhood friendship, but their lives take drastically different paths involving crime, addiction, and tragedy.

filmography.title: Gold Diggers of 1933
filmography.role_description: A showgirl who sings the haunting 'Remember My Forgotten Man' number in this depression-era musical.
filmography.plot: Four aspiring actresses try to make ends meet during the Great Depression while hoping for a big break on Broadway.

filmography.title: Footlight Parade
filmography.role_description: The tough, loyal secretary and former partner of a musical director who secretly loves him.
filmography.plot: A musical director tries to outdo his rivals by creating amazing stage productions for movie theaters.

filmography.title: Dames
filmography.role_description: A stranded showgirl who blackmails a wealthy man into backing a Broadway show.
filmography.plot: A millionaire reformer tries to stop a Broadway show, unaware that his own money is funding it.

filmography.title: Bullets or Ballots
filmography.role_description: A racketeer's girlfriend who runs a numbers game and gets caught in a police sting.
filmography.plot: A detective goes undercover to infiltrate a powerful crime ring, putting his life on the line.

filmography.title: Stand-In
filmography.role_description: A former child star working as a stand-in who helps a mathematician save a movie studio.
filmography.plot: A timid mathematician is sent to Hollywood to save a failing movie studio and gets a crash course in the film industry.

filmography.title: There's Always a Woman
filmography.role_description: The inquisitive wife of a private investigator who tries to solve cases herself.
filmography.plot: A private eye returns to the District Attorney's office, but his wife decides to keep his agency open and solve crimes.

filmography.title: Topper Returns
filmography.role_description: A woman murdered in a haunted house who returns as a ghost to help find her killer.
filmography.plot: A ghost enlists the help of Cosmo Topper to find her murderer and save her wealthy friend.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Sound; Best Special Effects

filmography.title: Cry 'Havoc'
filmography.role_description: A former burlesque queen who volunteers as a nurse in Bataan during WWII.
filmography.plot: A group of female volunteers serve as nurses on Bataan while under siege by Japanese forces.

filmography.title: A Tree Grows in Brooklyn
filmography.role_description: The free-spirited, oft-married aunt who provides warmth and unconventional wisdom to her niece.
filmography.plot: A young girl comes of age in a Brooklyn tenement during the early 1900s, dealing with poverty and a beloved but alcoholic father.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Adventure
filmography.role_description: The sensible friend of a librarian who gets caught up in a sailor's romantic whirlwind.
filmography.plot: A roughneck sailor marries a librarian on a whim, leading to a clash of lifestyles and philosophies.

filmography.title: Nightmare Alley
filmography.role_description: A carnival mentalist who teaches a young con man the tricks of the trade, leading to his rise and fall.
filmography.plot: A con man climbs from a carnival barker to a high-society mentalist, but his ambition eventually leads to his ruin.

filmography.title: The Blue Veil
filmography.role_description: A fading musical star who befriends a nurse, earning Blondell an Oscar nomination.
filmography.plot: A widow dedicates her life to caring for other people's children as a nurse.

filmography.title: The Opposite Sex
filmography.role_description: A gossiping, oft-pregnant friend in this musical remake of 'The Women'.
filmography.plot: A woman discovers her husband is having an affair and is urged by her friends to get a divorce.

filmography.title: Desk Set
filmography.role_description: A sharp-witted librarian who works alongside Katharine Hepburn's character.
filmography.plot: A computer expert tries to prove that his electronic brain can replace the reference department of a television network.

filmography.title: Will Success Spoil Rock Hunter?
filmography.role_description: The secretary to a Hollywood star who gets involved in an advertising spoof.
filmography.plot: An advertising executive tries to get a Hollywood star to endorse a lipstick to save his job.

filmography.title: The Cincinnati Kid
filmography.role_description: A seasoned poker dealer who commands respect in the high-stakes game.
filmography.plot: An up-and-coming poker player tries to prove himself in a high-stakes match against a long-time master of the game.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: Stay Away, Joe
filmography.role_description: A local tavern owner who has a romantic interest in the father of Elvis Presley's character.
filmography.plot: A Native American rodeo rider returns to his reservation to help his family raise cattle.

filmography.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter
filmography.role_description: The fierce owner of a saloon in a mining town.
filmography.plot: A gigolo con man arrives in a mining town and is mistaken for a famous gunfighter.

filmography.title: Opening Night
filmography.role_description: An aging playwright whose new play causes an emotional breakdown for the lead actress.
filmography.plot: A Broadway actress confronts her own mortality and aging while rehearsing a play about a woman unable to admit she is aging.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: Grease
filmography.role_description: The kind-hearted waitress at the Frosty Palace who offers advice to the teenagers.
filmography.plot: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?
filmography.awards: People's Choice Award: Win – Favorite Motion Picture

filmography.title: The Champ
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite friend of the protagonist's ex-wife.
filmography.plot: An ex-champ boxer fights to keep custody of his son while planning a comeback in the ring.

filmography.title: Sinners' Holiday
filmography.role_description: Blondell's film debut alongside James Cagney, reprising her Broadway role.
filmography.plot: A young man gets involved in bootlegging and murder, threatening his mother's boardwalk business.
